dict.acceptation: 避开，避免，预防；[法]使无效，撤销，废止；

sent.orig: He tried his best to resist his anger, as to avoid fighting with others.
sent.trans: 10他努力把愤怒压了下去，从而避免avoid了一场打斗。

sent.orig: And they suggest ways to avoid getting hoarse. Drink avoid. Avoid tobacco smoke and other irritants.
sent.trans: 医生们还建议了几种方法去避免声音嘶哑：多喝水，避免吸人香烟和其他相关刺激物。

sent.orig: He would always avoid danger and tries his best to avoid danger and protect his life.
sent.trans: 他总是躲避危险，极尽全力地保护自己的性命。

sent.orig: It also has advice about how to avoid education avoid worthless educational programs and accrediting agencies.
sent.trans: 它也能给一些建议怎样避免进入教育经验差的教育组织和授权机构。

sent.orig: It was the main goal orientation of mastery-approach and avoid and performance-avoid in academic achievement goal.
sent.trans: 学业成就目标中掌握接近和掌握回避，表现回避三种目标取向都是中学生主流倾向。
